fields.description:
To set the bar-color for Windows in a {{Ti.UI.MobileWeb.NavigationGroup}} it seems that you have to use {{barColor}} on the Windows in the navigation group. This works for the initial window, but not for child windows you open in it later.

h1. To reproduce

Run the new Alloy version of the Sample.RSS on MobileWeb:
https://github.com/fokkezb/Sample.RSS/tree/alloy

As you see in the [app.tss|https://github.com/FokkeZB/Sample.RSS/blob/alloy/app/styles/app.tss#L14] I have set the barColor to red on all windows (thus including child windows). But as you see when you run it only the initial window has a red bar.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: NavigationGroup barColor set via Window does not work for child Windows

comments.body: Resolving as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
